description: This file integrates a memory client (mem0) with an agent that uses OpenAI chat models, managing user memory and interactions.

classes.name: MemoryClient
classes.description: Client for managing user memory, provided by mem0.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Agent that interacts with the language model and manages context.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: OpenAI chat model wrapper used for conversational AI.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Response object from agent run method containing conversation data.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds messages to the memory for a specific user.

methods.name: get_all
methods.description: Retrieves all memory messages for a user.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given prompt and returns a response.
